description: A popular choice, Greek salad is the epitome of classic sides. With bursts of tomatoes, crunchy cucumber and crumbly feta, this recipe has it all.
keywords: Greek salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Jan Feb 2021,Peanut free
name: Classic Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil, vinegar and oregano in a bowl, stirring to combine. Season.
Toss tomato, capsicum, cucumber, onion and olives in a large bowl. Divide among bowls. Cut each piece of feta horizontally. Top each bowl with feta and drizzle with dressing.
